channel.title: ArcLight Hollywood on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in ArcLight Hollywood on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Will L.A.’s Iconic Cinerama Dome Ever Re-Open?
item.description: The beloved Hollywood big-screen theater and adjoining ArcLight multiplex have lain dormant since COVID. Their fate remains mysteriously in limbo — but not for lack of wealthy suitors.
